A: 1. What is "MY MOUTH" called in French? (a) Mon next (b) Ma bouche (c) Ma t
2. What do you call "MY NOSE" in French? (a) Mon nex (b) Mon nez (c) Mon cou
3. What do you call "MY EYEBROW" in French? (a) Mon oeil (b) Mon front (c) Mon sourcil
4. Comment s' appelle "Mon cou"en Anglais? (a) My mouth (b) My chin (c) My neck
5. Comment s' appelle "Mon menton" en Anglais? (a) My mouth (b) My leg (c) My chin
6. What do you call "MY HAIR" in French? (a) Mes cheveux (b) Ma t
7. What do you call "MY FOREHEAD" in French? (a) Mon sourcil (b) Mon front (c) Mon cou
8. To say "We are delighted to see you" in French, you can simply say __________ (a) Nous sommes enchant
9. In French, "ENVIE" actually means __________ (a) Happy (b) Desire (c) Appreciation
10. What does "TRE BIEN DORMIE?" mean? (a) Good to see you (b) Hope you're doing well (c) Did you sleep well?
B: 1. Before _________ ascension, He told His disciples that He was going to prepare a place for them and He would come back to take them where He was going.
2. He warned them to be _________ since no one knows when He would come back.
3. A good _________ is the one that looks after a flock of sheep and gives his life for the sheep.
4. The bread of life is _________ who came from God down to this world.
5. Jesus answered and said, "I am the _________ the _________ and the _________ ; no one cometh unto the Father but by Me.

2. Narrate what we must do to be born again.
3. Explain the meaning of the term "Good Shepherd".
4. Explain how Jesus proved Himself to be a Good Shepherd.
5. Explain the meaning of the term "Bread of Life".
